file_content.text: Honestly, now, what do you two think of the Chiss? Creepy, right?
Very. They're like ghosts--there one moment, gone the next.
And those eyes... I didn't think this planet could get any colder until I caught one of them staring at me.
I don't know, I find their women rather... exotic.
Unless you want to wake up with a knife in your back, I'd stay away from that lot.
